Comments_List: I was able to work on my Arabic grammar and translation skills by carefully working through difficult texts. I also learned how to better translate some common Arabic phrases and words. I still have lots to learn, but I appreciated the pace and design of the course.

Yes, I would recommend this course to anyone wanting to improve their classical Arabic grammar. There are multiple courses that incorporate classical Arabic texts as part of the material to be covered, but this course really focuses on understanding grammar, so it is an ideal course for anyone looking to read texts more slowly and carefully.
